pullRequest.title: (#1300) Replace collection's Reversed by Iterator's Reversed
pullRequest.bodyText:
This is for #1300.
I added a Reversed implementation for Iterator in order to replace the one from collection used by Reversed for Iterable.

nodes.bodyText: @victornoel I didn't understood this test, seems that nothing is being done... Also, could you try to put it in just one assertion?
